articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, President of the Council of State and President of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on April 23. 
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend congratulations to you on behalf of the party, government and people of Cuba on your reelection as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					
					 I, at the same time, reassure you that Cuba will steadily boost the fraternal relations between the two parties, governments and peoples.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks May Day
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks May Day
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Thursday to mark the 119th May Day.
					 Attending it were Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of working people's organizations, officials of ministries and national institutions, labor innovators and working people in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that May Day is a significant holiday as it offers an occasion for strikingly manifesting the revolutionary spirit and the militant might of the Korean working people all over the world and their international solidarity and unity with the workers the world over.
					
					 The popular masses' struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism was arduous and difficult but the Korean people could creditably discharge their mission and duty in the sacred struggle to victoriously advance the revolutionary cause of Juche, the socialist cause as they have been guided by the peerlessly great men, he noted.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung carved out a new path of revolution for realizing independence of popular masses under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and aroused the inexhaustible strength of the popular masses including workers, peasants and intellectuals, thus leading the revolution and construction to shining victory, the reporter said, and continued:
					
					The leadership exploits of the President have been given a steady continuity thanks to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who put forward the workers, peasants and intellectuals as the driving forces of the revolution and has led the popular masses' cause of independence, the socialist cause to victory only.
					
					 The annals of the Korean revolution are shining with undying feats of the workers and other working people who have devotedly worked for the country and the revolution true to the leadership of the party and the leader.
					
					 The Korean working people will strikingly demonstrate their heroic stamina as socialist workers, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il  and thus fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, and get the fireworks of victory displayed in the blue sky over the country.
					
					 Referring to the grave difficulties lying in the way of national reunification due to the reckless moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK on the part of the U.S. and the south Korean conservative ruling forces, the reporter stressed the need for all the Koreans to resolutely foil the outsiders' interference and the anti-reunification forces' confrontational moves under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and bring about a decisive turn in the national reunification movement.
					
					 The working people in the DPRK will as ever discharge their historic mission in protecting the world peace and security and stepping up the human cause of independence and further strengthen the international solidarity with working peoples the world over in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, the reporter declared.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Indicted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Indicted
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute in a white paper released on April 29 indicted the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for turning south Korea into mayhem of economic bankruptcy and people's deteriorated livelihood. It cites concrete facts to prove that this is entirely attributable to the group's sycophancy and treachery and unpopular rule. 
					 The white paper says that south Korean economy is one increasingly dependent on foreign monopoly capital as it is a colonial and crippled one which can not keep itself afloat without relying on others.
					
					 According to it, south Korean economy has got further deformed and increasingly dependent upon others since wicked sycophantic traitor Lee Myung Bak came to power.
					
					 Noting that the Lee group of conservatives has offered everything of south Korea to the U.S. under the signboard of "priority to the south Korea-U.S. alliance" since the very day of its seizure of power, thus making south Korea fall victim to the U.S. policy for aggression and plunder not only in political and military fields but in the economic field.
					
					 No sooner had traitor Lee become "president" than visited the U.S. to beg it to conclude FTA. He did not hesitate to commit such treachery as opening the south Korean markets to the American beef fraught with the danger of mad cow disease to please his master.
					
					 As if it were not enough with this, the group of traitors barbarically suppressed the mass struggle of south Koreans from all walks of life against the beef import.
					
					 The Lee group recklessly introduced foreign monopoly capital, turning south Korea into a business centre and "heavenly kingdom" for foreign monopoly capitalists.
					
					 They are holding sway over south Korean economy to meet their interests, holding 30 % of south Korea's stock markets and more than 60 % of stocks in the banking business, in particular. They thus rake up huge profits every year including more than billions of U.S. dollars in the name of stock dividend. 
					
					 The traitor, styling himself "economic president", bragged that he would save economy from a crisis and bring about "rapid growth" during the tenure of his office and thus make south Korea an "economically advanced nation" in a decade to come. But he pushed the south Korean economy to stagnation and catastrophe.
					
					 Export which the group claims to be a lifeline of south Korean economy, is rapidly declining and population's consumption and investment in equipment experienced a slump and stock market is undergoing serious chaos, falling into stagnation and collapse.
					
					 After the group of conservatives came to power, south Korea's "state debts" reached an astronomical figure. It is so heavily saddled with the foreign debts which need to be redeemed urgently that the south Korean economy will go totally bankrupt if they are paid at one time.
					
					 The white paper cites facts to prove that enterprises are proving insolvent and those that survived are carrying out "restructuring", leaving a great number of workers jobless. It goes on:
					
					 The gap between the rich and the poor has widened, the people have been further impoverished in south Korea and it has been ridden with greater social evils since the group of conservatives came to power. 
					
					 Housing shortage is getting worse and commodity prices and taxes are skyrocketing. Prices of medicines and doctor's fees are also rising, making it hard for the sick people to receive treatment. Young people and children are denied the opportunity of learning due to the snowballing tuition fees and hard living.
					
					 South Korea has earned ill fame not only as a "den of criminals" but "the worst land plagued with suicides."
					
					  The majority of people in south Korea are suffering from the serious economic crisis and destitution while a tiny handful of those in the ruling quarters are wallowing in luxury, accumulating wealth through all sorts of corruption and irregularities.
					
					 The Lee group can neither evade responsibility for having pushed south Korean economy and people's livelihood to catastrophe nor escape the stern punishment of history and the nation for its acts of treachery and crimes committed against the people.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest was closed with due ceremony at the Weightlifting Gymnasium in Chongchun Street here on April 30. It was opened on April 7 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In the contest the national records were renewed in ten subdivided events of shooting, weightlifting and swimming.
					
					 The April 25 Sports Team won the men's football title and the men's and women's volleyball and field hockey titles while the Rimyongsu Sports Team the women's football title.
					
					 The Sobaeksu Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team respectively came first in the men's and women's basketball events, the Pyongyang Sports Team and the Rimyongsu Sports Team in the men's and women's table tennis team events and the Ryesonggang Sports Team and the Sports Team of Pyongyang University of Medicine in the men's and women's handball events.
					
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Addressing the ceremony, Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, called upon all players and coaches to fully display the national flag of the DPRK in every international tournament on the basis of their achievements and experience made in the contest.

articles.title: Korean Speciality Foods Gift Set
articles.content:
Korean Speciality Foods Gift Set
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Samilpho Specialties Shop in Taedonggang District of Pyongyang is crowded with people buying Korean speciality foods gift sets.
					 The set produced in the Samilpho Special Products Factory contains Chilbosan agarics liquor and various kinds of liquors, honeys, indan and others made from natural raw materials.
					
					 The Chilbosan agarics liquor made of agarics growing in Mt. Chilbo, spring water of Mt. Kumgang, honey and kaoliang is efficacious for promotion of metabolic function.
					
					 Regular drinking of the liquor makes it possible to purify the blood, raise immunity and to preserve the balance of physiology.
					
					 Sinjong liquor and antler and wild insam liquor are efficacious for invigorating energy, nourishing the blood and treating diseases such as neurasthenia, hypotension and cerebral anemia.
					
					 Cultivated wild insam honey, health food, which is mixed with rare restorative materials in northern highlands, improves heart function, recovers from fatigue and prevents aging.
					
					 Nutritious honey mixed with pine pollen is very good for treatment of the blood circulating system disorders and for increasing energy.
					
					 Eleutherococc indan is a health food which is made with more than 20 kinds of natural Koryo medicinal materials including clove and other plants growing in natural forests.
					
					 The set is very popular among tourists and travelers.

articles.title: Samilpho Special Products Factory
articles.content:
Samilpho Special Products Factory
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Samilpho Special Products Factory standing on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang is a general foodstuff processing base.
					 The modernly equipped factory produces more than 350 kinds of food including noodles, rice-cakes, cooking oil, confectionery, teas, processed local farm products and processed fish.
					
					 The foodstuffs of the factory are peculiar ones which are made of locally available raw materials.
					
					 They include 10 odd kinds of staple food including arrowroot starch noodle, buckwheat noodle, potato paste cakes. Side dishes number more than 60 kinds, among them pickles of Aster scaber, aralia shoots and perilla leaves as well as anise kimchi rich in natural herb flavor.
					
					 The factory produces a wide variety of teas including persimmon leaf tea, ginkgo leaf tea, mushroom tea and barley tea and Koryo medicines, honeys, agricultural products and others which are good for the improvement of health.
					
					 It turns out more than 50 brands of liquors including Chilbosan agarics liquor, Koryo wild insam liquor, antler and wild insam liquor, kudzu root liquor and Kumgangsan bellflower liquor. 
					
					 Very high in quality and packing standard, its products are popular at home and abroad.
					
					 Jong Yun Ho, director of the factory, told KCNA his factory would produce larger quantities of health foodstuffs and tonics made with natural specialties famous in Korea to help toward the improvement of the people's living.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Immortal Feats for National Reunification
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung published the famous work "Ten-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" in April Juche 82 (1993).
					 The programme clarifies all the principles and ways for realizing  great national unity and its cause including the general target of the great unity of the whole nation and the idea that whoever is concerned for the destiny of the nation should unite as one nation and pave the road to the reunification together, transcending all differences.
					
					 The President convened the historic April joint conference of the north and the south after the liberation of the country to decisively smash the move of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to fabricate "separate election and government" for the purpose of national division. In each period and each stage of the developing situation and reunification movement since then, he put forward reasonable proposals and took many measures for achieving the great unity of the nation and creating a peaceful environment for the national reunification.
					
					 Entering the 1970s, he made a breach in the dialogue and negotiations between the north and the south which had been in a deadlock and saw to it that the July 4 North-South Joint Statement was adopted, the main content of which is the three principles of national reunification, thus bringing about a turning phase for reunification.
					
					 Having advanced national reunification as the supreme task of the nation, the President set forth the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation in the 1980s and the 1990s. He, thus, provided an almighty weapon for the cause of reunification to be taken consistently by the nation.
					
					 He, with warm love for the fellow countrymen, boundless generosity and magnanimity, led the people of all strata who aspired after reunification to the efforts for the sacred cause of national reunification. Saying that the greatest gift he would give to the nation is the reunified country, he approved a document related to reunification and left his autograph on it in the last moments of the great life when his heart stopped beating.
					
					The sacred cause of reunification, a lifelong desire of the President, is being carried forward brilliantly by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo set forth by the President as the three charters for national reunification. He also put forward the five-point policy for great national unity, thus brightly lighting the way for achieving the national unity and reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation will strictly adhere to and thoroughly implement the idea, line and policy for the great unity of the nation, which are associated with the lofty patriotism and will of the peerlessly great men, and achieve national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Defending Japan's Moves for Reinvasion
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group Accused of Defending Japan's Moves for Reinvasion
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is busy conniving at, defending and supporting the Japanese reactionaries' brigandish distortion of history and moves for reinvasion. These are intolerable acts of treachery as they cover up the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past such as aggression and plunder and crimes against humanity and pave the way for the Japanese reactionaries' reinvasion. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 It goes on: Lurking behind the reckless remarks made by the Tokyo governor who is a typical icon of the ultra-right elements of Japan, and the action taken by the Japanese Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology to justify the Japanese imperialists' bloody aggression and colonial rule over Korea and other Asian countries are very sinister and dangerous aims to write off their crimes recorded in their history and infuse the departed soul of the militarists into the younger generation in a bid to realize the ambition for "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" without fail. 
					
					 The south Korean ruling quarters, a group of sycophants serving Japan, who do not have even an iota of national self-respect and soul, make no scruple of selling off the interests of the nation, defending those dangerous moves, instead of taking issue with them. 
					
					 The Japanese militarist forces who seek reinvasion, debasing the history of the Korean nation and whitewashing the crime-woven history and the Lee group selling off the dignity and interests of the nation and working hard to do harm to fellow countrymen in reliance upon them are the reactionaries of history in the same boat. 
					
					 If the traitors are allowed to remain within the nation, they will do harm to the dignity and interests of the nation and it will be impossible for the whole nation to protect even their inviolable territory and it will not be able to escape horrible disasters in the end. 
					
					 All the Koreans will surely force Japan to pay for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past in order to protect the dignity of the nation. They will strictly settle accounts with the Japanese reactionaries, their sworn enemy, for their moves for reinvasion and with the Lee group for encouraging them in these moves to serve Japan.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean War Exercises and Aerial Espionage against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean War Exercises and Aerial Espionage against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and the south Korean puppet army warmongers got more frantic with exercises for a war of aggression and aerial espionage against the DPRK in the land, the sea and the air in April, while groundlessly pulling it up over its satellite launch, according to military sources. 
					 The south Korean puppets started the integrated operational exercises of civilians, government offices, the army and police by mobilizing units of the puppet armed forces, local administrative organs, the police and "Homeland Defence Reserve Forces" on April 29. They staged madcap exercises for high-speed maneuverability, combat shooting and coordinated operation of infantry units and motorized units of the puppet armed forces on April 20 while kicking up atmosphere of a war against the DPRK. 
					
					The puppet army warmongers were busy with the drills for transport of river-crossing and bridge equipment and its laying on April 9. The puppet armed bandits deployed on the forefront staged offensive operation exercises on April 27 and 28, firing more than 12,000 large-caliber machine gun and automatic rifle bullets.
					
					 Artillery pieces and groups of tanks of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea and the puppet armed forces kicked up war hysteria while firing hundreds of shells on April 3 and 15. 
					
					 The puppet navy brought naval forces of New Zealand to waters of the East Sea of Korea between April 17 and 22 for staging a combined antisubmarine exercise. It was busy with a joint strike exercise of warships and flying corps in the West Sea of Korea on April 28.
					
					 The puppet navy dispatched dozens of destroyers, submarines, intelligence-gathering and reconnaissance craft and guard ships between April 6 and 14 to stage fire strike exercises and combined marine exercises under the simulated conditions of an actual war. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. imperialists had more than 20-30 fighter bombers, pursuit assault planes, special operational planes, mid-air refueling tankers and commanding planes deployed round the clock during the month in the bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea and the puppet air forces to stage madcap drills for striking targets in the depth of the DPRK, providing close air support and fighting air battles. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists committed more than 100 cases of aerial espionage against the DPRK while the south Korean puppet armed forces at least 70 cases in April.
					
					 The dangerous war exercises and aerial espionage perpetrated by them against the DPRK before and after its satellite launch for peaceful purposes clearly prove that their war moves to stifle it and make a preemptive attack on it have reached an extremely reckless phase.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged to Step down
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged to Step down
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) issued a resolution on April 25 calling for the actions to force the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to step down on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the formation of Hanchongryon.
					 The resolution recalled that since its formation Hanchongryon has waged a positive struggle for the independence of campus, democracy of society and the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 In the past the security authorities have detained so many young patriotic people and even taken their lives through the repressive campaigns to stamp out Hanchongryon, but they could not quell the patriotic enthusiasm and righteous conscience of the youth and students, the resolution noted. 
					
					 It accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of suppressing the movement for social democracy and reunification, labeling Hanchongryon and the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and other pro-reunification patriotic organizations as "enemy-benefiting ones" on charges of violation of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The resolution charged that the present regime has brought the south-north relations to complete collapse by totally negating the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, milestones for reunification, and tightening the "war alliance" with the U.S.
					
					 It declared that Hanchongryon would stage dynamic actions to force the Lee Myung Bak regime to step down and achieve independent reunification.

articles.title: Actions for Repeal of Evil Law and for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions for Repeal of Evil Law and for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea issued a resolution on April 25, declaring its will to wage a more dynamic struggle for the repeal of the "National Security Law" and for the independent reunification.
					 The resolution referred to the fact that many pro-reunification patriots are still behind bars for struggling national reunification and the democratization of the south Korean society.
					
					 Since the emergence of the Lee Myung Bak "government", in particular, an increasing number of people have been detained on charges of violating the NSL, the "law on assembly and demonstration" and other evil laws, it deplored.
					
					 It urged the present regime to immediately scrap the NSL, an evil law against reunification, and lift the label of "enemy-benefiting" organizations attached to pro-reunification patriotic organizations including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, the Federation of University Student Councils and the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					
					 The organization will stage positive actions against the security authorities' human rights abuses and moves to fake up cases and for the release of all the prisoners of conscience and lifting of search for those wanted for political offences, it noted.

articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and sports events were held in Nepal, Uganda and Russia between Apr. 11 and 15 to commemorate the 97th anniversary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), highly praised Kim Il Sung as the benefactor of Korea's liberation, invincible and iron-willed commander and father of socialist Korea.
					
					 He noted that the revolutionary cause of Juche started by Kim Il Sung is being successfully carried forward under the distinguished leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, said that April 15 is a very significant day of history not only to the Korean people but also to the world progressives. Kim Il Sung, who performed the immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the world revolution, is the most prominent person recognized by the world, he added.
					
					 S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, stated that the Korean People's Army has grown to be an army strong in ideology and faith and an invincible army fully prepared in the aspect of military technique under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director-general of a Russian forestry co. ltd. said that Kim Il Sung was a prominent thinker-theoretician and leader of the state and a close friend of the Russian people as he performed enormous feats for the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" was brought out in booklet by the Political Coordinating Council of the "Patriots of Russia" Party.
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), clarifies that the driving force for Korea's reunification is the Korean nation itself and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the entire nation.
					
					 A ceremony of releasing the work took place at the building of the council on April 23.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 23 Raul Castro Ruz, Segundo Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					  El mensaje senala:
					
					  Lo felicito, en nombre del Partido Comunista, del Gobierno y del pueblo cubanos, con motivo de su reeleccion como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, al tiempo que le reitero la disposicion de seguir fortaleciendo los fraternales lazos que unen a nuestros Partidos, gobiernos y pueblos.

articles.title: IRP acusa a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
IRP acusa a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ATCC) -- El hecho de que el Sur de Corea se ha sumergido en el caos de quiebra economica y depauperacion de la vida popular, se debe enteramente a las maniobras vendepatrias y serviles a las grandes potencias y a la politica antipopular de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					Asi senalo el Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) en su carta blanca publicada el dia 29 y continuo:
					
					La economia surcoreana es la totalmente colonial y deformada que no puede existir ni por un momento sin dependerse del capital de los monopolios extranjeros.
					
					Estos puntos vulnerables de la economia surcoreana se agravaron despues de la llegada al poder de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					Desde los primeros dias de su mandato, la banda conservadora de Lee entrego en bandeja a EE.UU. todas las cosas pretextando la "prioridad a las relaciones de alianza Sur de Corea-EE.UU.".
					
					De esta manera, convirtio el territorio surcoreano en la victima de la politica de agresion y saqueo de EE.UU. tanto en lo politico-militar como en lo economico.
					
					Tan pronto como ocupara la "presidencia", el traidor Lee viajo a EE.UU suplicando a este la firma del "Tratado de Libre Comercio" y perpetro para congraciarse con su amo gringo el acto criminal y antinacional de abrir el mercado surcoreano a la carne de vacas locas norteamericanas.
					
					Insatisfecho con esto, la camarilla de Lee reprimio de manera barbara la lucha masiva de los surcoreanos de distintos sectores contra la importacion de la carne de vacas locas de EE.UU.
					
					Tambien, introdujo descabelladamente el capital de monopolios extranjeros convirtiendo el Sur de Corea en el "paraiso" de ellos.
					
					Actualmente, los monopolios extranjeros poseen el 30% del mercado surcoreano de acciones, en particular, mas de 60 % de las acciones de la banca y controlan a su gusto la economia surcoreana.
					
					De esta manera, ganan fabulosos reditos como la recaudacion por ano de miles de millones de dolares solo por el concepto del dividendo por acciones.
					
					Al autoproclamarse como "presidente economico", el traidor Lee dijo con fanfarroneria que durante el periodo de su mandato, salvaria la economia de la crisis y lograria el "rapido crecimiento" para convertir despues de 10 anos al Sur de Corea en el "pais avanzado en la economia". Pero, sucedio todo lo contrario.
					
					En particular, se redujo bruscamente la exportacion, item vital de la economia surcoreana, y cayeron en estancamiento el consumo popular y las inversiones en equipos.
					
					Igualmente, la bolsa de valores sufre el caos y el estancamiento muy criticos esperando su derrumbe.
					
					Despues de la toma del poder por la banda conservadora, la "deuda estatal" del Sur de Corea alcanzo una cifra astronomica.
					
					Las deudas externas del Sur de Corea llegaron a tal punto que la economia surcoreana se dara a la quiebra si paga de una vez solo las deudas que urgen ser desembolsadas.
					
					Fueron quebradas muchas empresas y las sobrevivientes se vieron obligadas a realizar la "reestructuracion", segun la cual quedaron despedidos un sinnumero de obreros.
					
					Se agudizaron las diferencias entre los pobres y los ricos y se torno mas depauperada la vida de los habitantes mientras que reinan en la sociedad todas las maldades.
					
					Se empeora el problema de la vivienda y suben exorbitantemente el precio y los impuestos. 
					
					Tambien, el constante aumento de los costos de medicamentos y asistencia medica impide a los enfermos acudir al hospital y la carestia de la vida y el estudio sofoca la aspiracion a estudiar.
					
					El Sur de Corea es tristemente celebre como "reino de criminales" y "pais de suicidas".
					
					Mientras que la abrumadora mayoria de la poblacion sufre las dificultades de la vida por la crisis economica, un punado de los gobernantes viven despilfarrando y multiplicando sus bienes por los metodos ilicitos y corruptos de todo tipo.
					
					La banda de Lee Myung Bak no podra liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad de haber llevado a la ruina la economia y la vida popular y sus crimenes antinacionales y antipopulares seran condenados severamente por la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: Acto central por 119o aniversario del Primero de Mayo
articles.content:
Acto central por 119o aniversario del Primero de May
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 119o aniversario del Primero de Mayo, Dia Internacional de los Trabajadores de todo el mundo.
					  Participaron en la ocasion Kim Jung Rin, Yang Hyong Sop, el presidente de partido amigo, los cuadros de las organizaciones de masas, los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, los innovadores laborales y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Yang Hyong Sop, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  El Primero de Mayo es la fiesta significativa en que los trabajadores coreanos fortalecen la solidaridad y la unidad internacionales con sus colegas de todo el mundo mostrando plenamente su impetu revolucionario y poderio combativo, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					  Aunque fue muy ardua y dificil la lucha de las masas populares por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo, bajo la direccion de los grandes hombres sin pares, el pueblo coreano pudo cumplir magnificamente su mision y deber en la sagrada lucha por impulsar victoriosamente la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la socialista.
					
					  El Presidente Kim Il Sung allano el nuevo camino de la revolucion para verificar la independencia de las masas populares bajo la bandera de la idea Juche y la del Songun (priorizacion militar) y oriento la revolucion y la construccion a la fulminante victoria movilizando las inagotables fuerzas de las masas populares incluyendo la clase obrera, el campesinado y los intelectuales.
					
					  Las hazanas de direccion del Presidente las llevan adelante el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien preparo a los obreros, campesinos e intelectuales como fuerte sujeto de la revolucion y condujo a la victoria la causa de independencia y la socialista.
					
					  En las decadas de la revolucion coreana se registraron los imborrables meritos de los obreros y otros trabajadores quienes lucharon abnegadamente por la patria y la revolucion en acato a la direccion del partido y el lider.
					
					  Al manifestar en alto grado el temperamento heroico del trabajador socialista apoyando fielmente la guia del Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, abriremos de par en par en 2012, ano del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, las puertas a la gran potencia prospera y dispararemos al cielo azul de nuestro pais los fuegos artificiales para celebrar la victoria.
					
					  Hoy dia, debido a las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. y las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el poder para desatar la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC, se crearon graves dificultades en el camino de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  Todos los coreanos frustraran tajantemente la intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras y las maniobras conflictivas de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion enarbolando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y registraran de esta manera un viraje decisivo en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					  En el futuro tambien, los trabajadores coreanos seguiran cumpliendo su historica mision para defender la paz y la seguridad del mundo y acelerar la causa de independencia de la humanidad y fortaleciendo la solidaridad internacional con sus homologos de todo el planeta bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.

articles.title: Juego de alimentos especiales que se vende en la Tienda Samilpho
articles.content:
Juego de alimentos especiales que se vende en la Tienda Samilpho
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ATCC) -- En estos dias, muchos clientes acuden a la Tienda de Productos Especiales Samilpho, situada en el capitalino municipio de Taedonggang, para adquirir el juego souvenir de alimentos especiales de Corea.
					  En este juego, que se produce en la Fabrica de Productos Especiales Samilpho, se incluyen los licores como el de hongo del pino del monte Chilbo, las mieles, Indan y otros alimentos hechos con materias primas naturales.
					
					  Especialmente, el licor hecho con el hongo del pino del monte Chilbo, el agua de la fuente del monte Kumgang, la miel y el sorgo resulta muy efectivo para mejorar el metabolismo.
					
					  La toma regular de ese licor permite purificar la sangre, elevar la inmunidad del cuerpo humano y mantener el equilibrio de las funciones fisiologicas y la resistencia al acido.
					
					  El licor Sinjong y el del cuerno de ciervo y ginseng silvestre despiertan gran vigor en el cuerpo humano y son ideales para tonificar y curar las enfermedades como la neurastenia, la hipotension y la anemia cerebral.
					
					  La miel de ginseng silvestre, conocido como producto para la longevidad hecho con tonicos preciosos de la zona montanosa septentrional, mejora las funciones cardiacas, libera de la fatiga espiritual y fisica y previene el envejecimiento.
					
					  La miel nutritiva de polen del pino es muy efectiva en la curacion de enfermedades del sistema circulatorio y el incremento de la energia.
					
					 Indan de Eleutherococc es comestible de salubridad elaborado con mas de 20 especies de materias medicinales naturales de Coryo como Eleutherococc y clavero crecidos en el bosque.
					
					  Ese juego esta en boga entre los turistas y los viajeros a larga distancia.
